alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 3:30AM CDT until August 08 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 330 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arcadia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Choctaw, Harrah, McLoud, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Luther, Wellston, Carney, Arcadia, Warwick, Fallis, Dale, and Newalla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
